name: Mosquito Man
description:
Story

You were about to get in prision when a radioactive mosquito bit you. Now, you are a mosquito too and the only way to escape from this prision is by killing as many police men as possible.

Instructions

Move with: W, A, S, D

Move in slow motion with: SPACE

try to kill as many police men as possible

How to download
  1. click on the download button
  2. open the downloaded folder
  3. open the file called Mosquito Man.exe
